entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, Harry is described as having worse spirits than usual despite achieving a great feat.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: A person who was helped by Harry and his friends to achieve freedom.

entities.name: professor lupin
entities.description: A Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher who is leaving at the end of the school year.

entities.name: seamus finnigan
entities.description: A student in Harry's class who is gloomy about Professor Lupin's departure.

entities.name: dean thomas
entities.description: A student in Harry's class who suggests that maybe they will get a vampire as their next teacher.

entities.name: professor trelawney
entities.description: A teacher who made a prediction that is weighing on Harry's mind.

entities.name: pettigrew
entities.description: A person who betrayed Sirius and is now being sought by Voldemort.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, who Pettigrew has possibly sought sanctuary with.

relationships.description: Harry and his friends helped Sirius to achieve freedom.
